# moveItem(_:afterItem:)

**Instance Method**

Moves the item from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately after the specified item.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func moveItem(_ identifier: ItemIdentifierType, afterItem toIdentifier: ItemIdentifierType)
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: The identifier of the item to move in the snapshot.
- **toIdentifier**: The identifier of the item after which to move the specified item.

## Reordering Items and Sections

- **moveItem(_:beforeItem:)**: Moves the item from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately before the specified item.
- **moveSection(_:afterSection:)**: Moves the section from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately after the specified section.
- **moveSection(_:beforeSection:)**: Moves the section from its current position in the snapshot to the position immediately before the specified section.
